title: **Welcome to Gay+ Men Meditating!**  <:yoga:880724849889259570>
description: We are a safe and friendly group of gay+ (gay/bisexual/bi-curious) men who are into meditation or yoga. To join, you have to properly answer these questions:

fields.value:
**1**. Tell us about yourself.
**2**. Describe your experience with meditation and/or yoga, if any.
**3**. Why do you want to join this group?

Include @moderator in your message so we will be notified of your answers.*
fields.name: ​

footer.text:
​
*You may directly message a moderator with your answers if you prefer. A moderator will review your answers as soon as possible and determine whether to give you access. 

Caution: This channel is auto-moderated so please keep your answers brief, proper-cased and free of links or any terms of abuse.
